mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), boardId = #{boardId}, memberId = #{memberId}, title = #{title}, `body` = #{body}
mapper.select: SELECT A.* ,M.nickname AS extra__writer FROM article AS A LEFT JOIN `member` AS M ON A.memberId = M.id WHERE A.id = #{id}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM article AS A WHERE 1
AND A.boardId = #{boardId}
AND A.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND A.body LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND ( A.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR A.body LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') )
